text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif
PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif

text.id: 1、请将您要投注的号码输入或粘贴到输入框
text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif
text.tspan: 1. Enter or paste bet number into input box.

text.id: 1、导入的注单文件，必须是-txt-格式
text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif
text.tspan: 1. Export orders document must be in txt format.

text.id: 2、可点击导入按钮或将文件拖拽到文本框进
text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif
text.tspan: 2. Export or drag document into input box to upload.

text.id: 3、最高可导入10万注，若文件较大时导入
text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif
text.tspan: 3. Export limits as 100K betting. Export longer if huge document. Be patient.

text.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif
text.tspan: 2. Use TAB, Enter, Space or Symbol between 2 betting No. (,), (;), (I) etc. as orders.

tspan.font-family: PingFang SC, Microsoft YaHei, WenQuanYi Micro Hei, sans-serif
